name: Name
LanguageChangedText: The app will restart to apply the new language. Are you sure you want to continue?
X-ReportDesc: A report containing results such as sales and profit within a certain time interval.
Z-ReportDesc: A report containing results such as sales and profit at the end of the day.
CampaignsDesc: The report containing detailed information about the campaign lists in the current store.
OtherDesc: All other reports related to the store.
SalesDesc: Provides an overview of sales performance, including revenue and profit, over a specific time period.
ProductDesc: Offers a detailed breakdown of product sales and profitability at the end of the day.
AddProductDesc: This functionality allows you to add a new product to your inventory.
Otherdesc: All other transection related to the store.
Desc1: User interface theme that uses dark colors for the background and text
Desc2: The state of being free from unauthorized access or public view.
Desc3: A section on a website or app that provides information about the company or organization.
Desc4: An option to modify your login password.
Desc5: A user interface theme that uses light colors for the background and text.
Desc6: Indicates that the store is currently operational for business.
Desc7: A function to verify if the printer is working properly.
Desc8: The process of manually updating data between devices or applications.
Desc9: An option to modify the language used in the interface.
Desc10: The action of ending your current session on an application or website.
Desc11: The scheduled working hours for a particular shift.
Desc12: Objectives or targets that you are aiming to achieve.
Desc13: The option to switch between different accounts or user profiles.
Desc14: The ability to modify your personal information on the platform.
Desc15: This term likely refers to a specific report type within your system. Its meaning depends on your context.
Desc16: Similar to X-Report, this refers to a specific report type. Consult your system's documentation for clarification.
Desc17: Marketing or promotional efforts undertaken to achieve a specific goal.
Desc18: A section where you can browse and view information about available products.
Desc19: The functionality to add new items to your product inventory.
Desc20: A report containing information about sales performance, such as revenue and quantity sold.
